channel.title: Comments on: Rethink.fm – a “what if podcast” for WordPress.
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/rethink-fm-a-what-if-podcast-for-wordpress/#comment-525">Jackie D'Elia</a>.
Hey Jackie, sounds good, intrigued to hear more.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jackie D’Elia.

Hey Jackie, sounds good, intrigued to hear more.

item.title: By: Jackie D'Elia
item.dc:creator: Jackie D'Elia
item.description: Coming soon. There will lots of discussions on Genesis for sure. My favorite framework. In addition, conversations with forward thinkers about how they're rethinking their design and front-end development processes. Moving forward.
item.content:encoded: Coming soon. There will lots of discussions on Genesis for sure. My favorite framework. In addition, conversations with forward thinkers about how they’re rethinking their design and front-end development processes. Moving forward.
